title:
What\'s up with all the police presence on I-40 near Wilmington today?  I saw over a dozen cars on different exits and saw some cars being searched.  



Was this a training mission or a sting of some sort?
text:
The New Hanover County Sheriff's Office is conducting training in
that area. Public safety reporter Brian Freskos tells me details on
the training might be made available tomorrow. Thanks for the tip.
